Package com.google.android.material.motion.runtime

Material Motion Android Runtime package.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Performer.DelegatedPerformance
    A Performer implements this interface in order to delegate its work to another API.
    Performer.DelegatedPerformance.DelegatedPerformanceCallback
    A callback to be provided to a Performer.DelegatedPerformance Performer.
    Performer.ManualPerformance
    A Performer implements this interface in order to do manual calculations in Performer.ManualPerformance.update(float).
    Performer.PlanPerformance
    A Performer implements this interface in order to support the Add Plans API.
    Plan.SerializablePlan
    Plans should implement this interface if it wants to support the serialize API.
    Scheduler.StateListener
    A listener that receives callbacks when the Scheduler's Scheduler.State changes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Performer
    A Performer is an object responsible for executing a Plan.
    Plan
    A Plan is an object representing what you want something to do.
    Scheduler
    A Scheduler accepts Transactions and creates Performers.
    Transaction
    A Transaction aggregates requests for Plans to be assigned to targets.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Performer.PerformerInstantiationException
    Thrown when there is an instantiation failure.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Scheduler.State
    The state of a Scheduler.

Package com.google.android.material.motion.runtime Description

Material Motion Android Runtime package.

API documentation for the Material Motion Android Runtime library.

This package defines two important abstract classes:

  • Plan
  • Performer
and two concrete classes:
  • Transaction
  • Scheduler
Learn more about these APIs by reading our Starmap.

Basic Usage

Let’s say we want to describe a view as fading out.

Step 1: Define the Plan

First, we define a new Plan class.

In FadeOutPlan.java; 

{@code
 public class FadeOutPlan extends Plan {
